name: Quantum Duck
text:
2+ "Duck" Effect monsters
When this card is Link Summoned, flip a coin. If you call it right, you can Special Summon a "Duck" monster from your GY. If you call it wrong, take 2000 damage. Once per turn, you can equip a "Duck" monster from your GY to this card. If a "Duck" monster is targeted for an attack or effect, you can change the target to another monster you control. All "Duck" monsters that this card points to gain 500 ATK. This card gains 500 ATK for each "Duck" on the field and in the GY’s.
